EmailTemplate.name: No Fee or Fingerprinting
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Fee not updated & Finger printing not complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!LicenseApplication__c.Application_Submitted_By__c},
The Application for {!LicenseApplication__c.Location_DBA__c} has been completed but the fingerprints and application fee have not been updated in Salesforce. Please follow up with the location and confirm both have been completed. Thank you,
Link to Application Record:
{!LicenseApplication__c.Link}
